data.3: (That) We sent it down one night of blessing -- so that We could warn --
data.4: On which all affairs are sorted out and decided
data.5: As commands from Us. It is indeed We who send (messengers),
data.6: A mercy from your Lord. Verily He is all-hearing and all-knowing,
data.7: The Lord of the heavens and the earth and all that lies between them, if you really do believe.
data.8: There is no god other than He, who gives you life and death, your Lord and the Lord of your fathers of old.
data.9: Yet they are lost in doubt and play.
data.10: So watch for the day when the sky begins to emit clear smoke,
data.11: Which would envelope mankind. That would be a grievous affliction.
data.12: "O Lord, take away this torment from us," (they will pray); "we have come to believe."
data.13: How can a warning benefit them? The Apostle who explained all things clearly had come to them,
data.14: But they turned away from him, and said: "He is well-instructed, (but) possessed."
data.15: If We remove the torment a little, you revert back (to misdeeds).
data.16: The day that We shall seize them with a grievous hold, We will indeed castigate them.
data.17: We had tried the people of Pharaoh before them. A respected prophet had come to them (saying):
data.18: "Deliver the creatures of God to me. I am the trusted messenger sent to you.
data.19: Do not think yourselves to be above God: I have come to you with clear authority.
data.20: I have taken refuge in my Lord and your Lord against your stoning me to death.
data.21: If you do not believe in me, leave me alone."
data.22: Then he called to his Lord: "These are a sinful people."
data.23: "Journey by night with My devotees," (it was said); "you will certainly be pursued.
data.24: (Cross and) leave the sea undisturbed. The (pursuing) hosts will surely be drowned,"
data.25: How many gardens and fountains did they leave behind,
data.28: Thus it was; and We passed them on to another people.
data.29: Neither did the heavens weep for them, nor the earth, nor were they granted respite.
data.30: So We saved the children of Israel from degrading suffering
data.31: They (had experienced) under the Pharaoh. He was certainly a tyrant, guilty of excess.
data.32: And We exalted them over the other people knowingly,
data.33: And sent them tokens to bring out the best in them.
data.35: "There is no dying for us but once; and we shall not be raised again.
data.36: So bring our ancestors back, if you are truthful."
data.37: Are they better than the people of Tubba, and those who had lived before them, whom We destroyed as they were sinners?
data.38: We have not created the heavens and the earth and all that lies between them, out of play.
data.39: We created them with definite purpose; but most of them do not understand.
data.40: The Day of Judgement is your promised day of meeting,
data.41: The day when friend will help no friend in the least, nor will they be helped,
data.42: Apart from those to whom God is kind. He is all-mighty and all-merciful.
data.43: The tree of Zaqqum will indeed be
data.45: It is like pitch. It will fume in the belly
data.47: "Seize him and drag him into the depths of Hell," (it will be said),
data.48: "Then pour over his head the torment of scalding water."
data.49: "Taste it," (they will be told). "You were indeed the mighty and noble!
data.50: This is certainly what you had denied."
data.51: Surely those who fear and follow the straight path will be in a place of peace and security
data.52: In the midst of gardens and of springs,
data.53: Dressed in brocade and shot silk, facing one another.
data.54: Just like that. We shall pair them with companions with large black eyes.
data.55: They will call for every kind of fruit with satisfaction.
data.56: There they will not know any death apart from the first death they had died, and will be kept safe from the torment of Hell
data.57: By the beneficence of your Lord. This will be the great success.
data.58: Therefore We have made this (Qur´an) easy in your tongue. They may haply take a warning.
data.59: So you wait. They are also waiting.
